nested.help:
**Photo Requirements**
- Maximum file size: 8MiB
- Aspect ratio: Must be within a 4:5 to 1.91:1 range
- Minimum width: 320 (will be scaled up to the minimum if necessary)
- Maximum width: 1440 (will be scaled down to the maximum if necessary)
- Height: Varies, depending on width and aspect ratio
- Formats: JPEG

Please note that your image must be hosted on a publicly accessible URL and you cannot host your images on Google Drive even if the file is shared publicly because Instagram API is not able to download files from Google Drive. The same applies to Dropbox URLs.
nested.name: image_url
nested.label: Photo URL

spec.help: Must not start with `@`. User must have a public Instagram account.
spec.name: username
spec.label: Username

spec.help: An optional float that indicates percentage distance from left edge of the published media image.
spec.name: x
spec.label: X position

spec.help: An optional float that indicates percentage distance from top edge of the published media image.
spec.name: y
spec.label: Y position

nested.help:
**Photo Requirements**
- Maximum file size: 100MiB
- Picture size:
   Maximum columns (horizontal pixels): 1920
   Minimum aspect ratio [cols / rows]: 4 / 5
   Maximum aspect ratio [cols / rows]: 16 / 9
- Duration: 60 seconds max, 3 seconds min
- Container: MOV or MP4 (MPEG-4 Part 14), no edit lists, moov atom at the front of the file
- Frame rate: 23-60 FPS
- Video codec: HEVC or H264, progressive scan, closed GOP, 4:2:0 chroma subsampling
- Video bitrate: VBR, 5Mbps maximum
- Audio codec: AAC, 48khz sample rate maximum, 1 or 2 channels (mono or stereo)
- Audio bitrate: 128kbps

Please note that your video must be hosted on a publicly accessible URL and you cannot host your videos on Google Drive even if the file is shared publicly because Instagram API is not able to download files from Google Drive. The same applies to Dropbox URLs.
nested.name: video_url
nested.label: Video URL

nested.help: Location, in seconds, of the video frame to be used as the cover.
nested.name: thumb_offset
nested.label: Cover Frame

notes.text: Due to permission restrictions with the LinkedIn API, I have been unable to upload images and retrieve their urn/uri for a multimage post.

The scenario named "ContentDistro" automates the distribution of content across multiple social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn. It listens for incoming webhooks, retrieves content from Airtable, and then posts the content to the specified platforms based on its type (text, photo, video, or carousel).

1. 96 - gateway:CustomWebHook  
This module listens for incoming webhooks to trigger the scenario.

2. 97 - airtable:ActionGetRecord  
This module retrieves a specific record from Airtable using the provided post ID, base, and table.

3. 4 - builtin:BasicRouter  
This module routes the flow based on conditions defined for different platforms.

   3.1 6 - builtin:BasicRouter  
   This module further routes the flow based on the type of content for Facebook.

      3.1.1 2 - facebook-pages:UploadVideo  
      This module uploads a video to a Facebook page if the post type is either "Reel" or "Video".

      3.1.2 7 - facebook-pages:CreatePost  
      This module creates a text post on Facebook if the post type is "Text".

      3.1.3 46 - builtin:BasicFeeder  
      This module feeds multiple media items for Facebook posts if the post type is "Multiple photos" or "Photo".

         3.1.3.1 48 - builtin:BasicAggregator  
         This module aggregates the URLs of the media items for Facebook.

         3.1.3.2 18 - facebook-pages:CreatePostWithPhotos  
         This module creates a Facebook post with photos using the aggregated media URLs.

   3.2 8 - builtin:BasicRouter  
   This module routes the flow based on the type of content for Instagram.

      3.2.1 9 - instagram-business:CreatePostPhoto  
      This module creates a photo post on Instagram if the post type is "Photo".

      3.2.2 10 - instagram-business:CreateVideoPost  
      This module creates a video post on Instagram if the post type is "Video".

      3.2.3 11 - instagram-business:CreateAReelPost  
      This module creates a reel post on Instagram if the post type is "Reel".

      3.2.4 58 - builtin:BasicFeeder  
      This module feeds multiple media items for Instagram carousel posts if the post type is "Multiple photos".

         3.2.4.1 60 - builtin:BasicAggregator  
         This module aggregates the image URLs for Instagram carousel posts.

         3.2.4.2 12 - instagram-business:CreateCarouselPhoto  
         This module creates a carousel photo post on Instagram using the aggregated media.

      3.2.5 61 - builtin:BasicFeeder  
      This module feeds multiple media items for Instagram carousel videos if the post type is "Multiple videos".

         3.2.5.1 63 - builtin:BasicAggregator  
         This module aggregates the video URLs for Instagram carousel posts.

         3.2.5.2 64 - instagram-business:CreateCarouselPhoto  
         This module creates a carousel video post on Instagram using the aggregated media.

   3.3 13 - builtin:BasicRouter  
   This module routes the flow based on the type of content for LinkedIn.

      3.3.1 14 - linkedin:CreateTextShare  
      This module creates a text share on LinkedIn if the post type is "Text".

      3.3.2 69 - http:ActionGetFile  
      This module retrieves media files from the provided URLs for LinkedIn posts.

         3.3.2.1 71 - builtin:BasicRouter  
         This module routes the flow based on the type of media for LinkedIn.

            3.3.2.1.1 15 - linkedin:CreateCompanyImagePost  
            This module creates an image post on LinkedIn if the post type is "Photo".

            3.3.2.1.2 77 - linkedin:createOrganizationVideoPost  
            This module creates a video post on LinkedIn if the post type is "Video".

      3.3.3 72 - builtin:BasicFeeder  
      This module feeds multiple media items for LinkedIn if the post type is "Multiple photos".

         3.3.3.1 101 - linkedin:MakeAPICall  
         This module registers an upload for multiple images on LinkedIn.

         3.3.3.2 102 - linkedin:MakeAPICall  
         This module makes an additional API call for LinkedIn.

         3.3.3.3 76 - builtin:BasicAggregator  
         This module aggregates the data for LinkedIn posts.

         3.3.3.4 98 - linkedin:CreateCompanyImagePost  
         This module creates a company image post on LinkedIn using the aggregated data.

         3.3.3.5 100 - http:ActionSendData  
         This module sends the final data to LinkedIn to create a multi-image post.

This scenario effectively connects to Airtable, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, performing actions such as creating posts, uploading videos, and handling multiple media types based on the content type received.
